content: as i did you decide 1 7 chain start in the 2nd chain from the hook 2 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet together 4sc 1 increase 14 3 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 increase 1 hdcinc 1 dcinc 1 half_double_crochet 1 slip_stitch together 1 slip_stitch 1 half_double_crochet together 1 dcinc 1 hdcinc 1 single_crochet 21 make 1 slip_stitch and fast off with an invisible finished and sew or glue it to the star s body * you can embroider or paint the eyes and the mouth in my case i made them with brown felt look at the picture to identify the upper pointed part of the star * to know where the face will be placed 8 ⓒ 2023 aramigumi free pattern all rights reserved to mayte puerto owner of @aramigumi @danani crafts @algodon__de__azucar___ @mar 1dz @mommyslittlepanda @gewkat58 @lolo amigurumi 9 ⓒ 2023 aramigumi free pattern all rights reserved to mayte puerto owner of @aramigumi
